channel.title: Help with Doors and Banks

item.title: Help with Doors and Banks
item.dc:creator: @MikeX MikeX
item.description:
@MikeX wrote:

ok so if i want to put new bank booth there i just put a bank booth in object.cfg where the one it now? and it replaces[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 04:47:14 PM[/size][hr][quote=“toxiccorn, post:2, topic:180285”]go into your objects.cfg or how ever you add objects on your server and do this… if you want to delete and object do this…

Say there is a bank booth at 3215, 3225 and you need it to be gone all you do is spawn and item right at the same cords, and it will replace it with that new item, if you want nothing there i’m like 90% sure that nothing is -1 so if you want nothing to be at 3215,3225 you put in this…

object = -1 3215 3225 0 -2 1 false[/quote]

That didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Doors and Banks
item.dc:creator: @toxiccorn toxiccorn
item.description:
@toxiccorn wrote:

go into your objects.cfg or how ever you add objects on your server and do this… if you want to delete and object do this…

Say there is a bank booth at 3215, 3225 and you need it to be gone all you do is spawn and item right at the same cords, and it will replace it with that new item, if you want nothing there i’m like 90% sure that nothing is -1 so if you want nothing to be at 3215,3225 you put in this…

object = -1 3215 3225 0 -2 1 false

item.title: Help with Doors and Banks
item.dc:creator: @MikeX MikeX
item.description:
@MikeX wrote:

I need to put a new bank like in yannile is there a way i can delete the bank booths and bankers in the one part of the new bank and add the bankers from yannille and i need help with the doors i got this so far.

I have a problem with that at edge the gate wolnt open and i cant fix it would u help me out here like i put this in case 152:

case 6743:
if (objectX == 1336 && objectY == 1336)
{
  TeleportToX = 1337;
  TeleportToY = 1337;
}

I know it’s not the right Cords… It’s just there for an example

Read full topic
